Module com.example.softmeth4
Package com.example.softmeth4

Class BuildOwnController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmeth4.BuildOwnController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class BuildOwnController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller class allows customers to build their own pizza orders on a JavaFX application This class contains methods to add and remove toppings, as well as various event handlers to handle popups and other events when buttons/checkboxes/combo boxes are selected and/or interacted with.
